title: Feature request: container/list: Add PopFront() and PopBack() methods.
body:
by **mizardx**: 
There already are PushFront() and PushBack() methods, which accept a value 
to add to the list. I think there should also be PopFront() and PopBack() 
methods, which removes an element and returns its value.

They would be just a few line of code, and wouldn't break any existing code. I believe
that popping a value from the list is an often used operation.
